title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
OB: When the actual servlet is invoked on async dispatch, the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener is incorrectly set to a different value.
EB: When the actual servlet is invoked, the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set up a ServletRequestListener in a Java application.
2. Trigger an async dispatch.
3. Check the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener.
